With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Ishaku Ibrahim can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. Like other Babban Gona members, Ishaku Ibrahim is looking to earn a better income to provide more food and clothing for his family, and hopes to become the most profitable farmer in his community.

loans.use: To buy food and clothing, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn at low prices during harvest.

loans.name: Rev. Bitrus

texts.en: Rev. Bitrus is a maize farmer from Chino village in Kaduna state. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Rev. Bitrus would have had to sell his maize at low prices soon after harvest to cater to his immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Rev. Bitrus can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. Rev. Bitrus, like other members of Babban Gona, intends to use the extra income to expand his farmland, and hopes to ensure other members of his community are lifted out of poverty.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn at low prices during harvest.

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en: Naomi is a maize farmer from Kiyawa village in Kaduna state. Before she became a Babban Gona member, Naomi would have had to sell her maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater to her immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Naomi can now store her maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40 percent higher than the market price at harvest. Naomi, like other members of Babban Gona, intends to use the extra income to expand her farmland and hopes to ensure her children are educated and have professional jobs.

loans.use: To buy food and clothing, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn at low prices at harvest

loans.name: Mauricio Felipe

texts.es:
Mauricio es un hombre de 24 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene un hijo de 2 años y trabaja como empleado archivista en una compañía de seguros.
Él es buen padre, emprendedor, responsable, inteligente y trabajador. Su trabajo lo realiza en la zona Central, un área caracterizada por el comercio en todas las áreas, como; universidades, oficinas públicas y empresas privadas que conviven lado a lado, de clima frio y seco con una temperatura variable entre 4-21 grados centígrados durante el día y en todo el año.
Mauricio es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, estatura mediana, su lengua materna es el aymara que ya no habla, y habla español para estudiar y en la vida diaria. Su vida la realiza junto a su pareja que se ocupa de cuidar su hijo y también estudia en la universidad, viven en una casa alquilada construida de ladrillo que cuenta con agua potable y electricidad. Su trabajo es el de archivista y sus funciones mayormente son; Coordinar y controlar la recepción de la documentación, Identificar las carpetas donde va a ser archivado el material, Recibir material para archivar, Clasificar el material para archivar, Codificar el material para archivar de acuerdo al código establecido, Suministrar expedientes y/o documentos a las diferentes unidades según la normativa vigente, Efectúar la lectura de los documentos a archivar, Archivar en los expedientes correspondientes los documentos recibidos, etc.; ‘Sin archivos no hay acceso a la información, mucho menos transparencia…’ comenta. Sus quehaceres diarios se dividen en el trabajo y la universidad. Su sueño es terminar su carrera profesional y obtener un buen trabajo para darle a su hija la calidad de vida que él no tuvo. Él desea realizar los pagos en gastos de matriculación y realizar la compra de dos computadoras portátiles; para él y para su pareja que también estudia en la universidad.
Es por esos motivos que Mauricio solicita un préstamo para pagar los gastos de matriculación y para la compra de 2 computadoras portátiles para que él y su pareja terminen la universidad.
texts.en:
Mauricio is a 24-year-old man who lives with his partner, has a two-year-old son and works as a filing clerk at an insurance company. He is a good father, entrepreneurial, responsible, intelligent and hardworking. His job is located in the central zone, an area characterized by all types of businesses such as universities, public offices and private companies that exist along side one another – and by a cold and dry climate with a temperate between 4 and 21 degrees Celsius during the day and throughout the year. 

Mauricio has a dark complexion, short black hair and is of medium height. His native language is “Aymara” which is no longer spoken, but he also speaks Spanish in order to study and in daily life. He lives together with his partner who looks after their child and also studies at the university. They live in a rented house built of brick with running water and electricity. 

He works as a filing clerk and his tasks mainly are: coordinate and monitor the receipt of documentation; identify the folders where the material will be filed; receive material to file; classify material to file; code the material according to an established coding system; provide records and/or documents to different units according to current regulations; complete a reading of the documents to file; and file the received documents in the appropriate files. “Without filing, there is no access to information, much less transparency,” Mauricio says. He divides his daily activities between his job and the university.

His dream is to complete his professional degree and obtain a good job in order to give his daughter a quality of life that he didn’t have. He wants to be able to pay tuition fees and purchase two laptops for himself and his partner who also studies at the university.  

It is for these reasons that Mauricio is asking for a loan to pay for tuition fees and buy two laptops so that he and his partner can graduate from the university.

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and buy two laptops for himself and his partner.

loans.name: Benjamin

texts.en:
Benjamin is 63 years old and lives in Tambulig, Molave, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines. He is married with 5 children. 

Benjamin has a hectare of rice field and has had this business for 40 years. He requested a loan to pay for labor and bags of fertilizers to have more sales in time of harvest. He has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. Someday, Benjamin wants to buy another hectare of rice field for his children.

loans.use: to pay for labor and bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. 
He is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to buy more seafood to sell to customers.
Richard successfully paid back his previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build his business.
NWTF is presenting Richard's business profile again in support of his efforts to secure the future of his family.

loans.use: to buy more seafood to sell.

loans.name: Jimmy Andres

texts.es:
Jimmy es un hombre con todas las pilas puestas para enfrentar el mundo y tener una vida plena gracias a sus esfuerzos.

Tiene un negocio en el que vende acolchados, cortinas y demás. Inicio el negocio hace 2 años y a pesar de su poco tiempo en funcionamiento ha tenido buena acogida en el sector.

El desea ampliar su oferta de productos y mejorar sus ventas inyectándole capital a su empresa, es por esta razón que solicita un crédito para abastecer su negocio. 

El dinero será invertido en la compra de mercancía con la que actualmente no cuenta y de este modo podrá mejorar su inventario.

Tiene grandes esperanzas en su actividad y piensa que su futuro puede mejorar considerablemente gracias al apoyo de estas entidades que hacen lo posible para que las personas puedan soñar con una vida mejor y más estable.

Impacta la vida de Jimmy con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Jimmy is a man ready and raring to go to face the world and have a full life thanks to his efforts.

He has a business that sells linens, curtains and other products.  He started his business two years ago and in spite of the short time he has been able to enjoy a good welcome to the market.

He wants to expand on the products he offers and improve sales by injecting capital to his business.  This is why he requests a credit to stock his business.

The money will be invested to buy merchandise that he currently doesn't have.  This way he will be able to improve and increase his inventory.

He has great hopes in his business and thinks that in the future he can improve considerably with the support of entities like this that make possible for people to dream with a better life and to be more stable.

Make an impact in Jimmy's life with a loan today!

loans.use: to buy merchandise that he currently doesn't have.

loans.name: Jenny

texts.en:
Jenny is 43 years old, married, and has one child. 
Jenny is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Jenny requested a PHP 24,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.
Jenny has been raising pigs for 19 years now and has borrowed 14 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.
In the future, Jenny would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Eli

texts.en: Eli is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Eli joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for her children: Tabita, Suzana and Labon. Before she became a Babban Gona member, Eli would have to sell her maize for low prices soon after harvest to cater to her immediate cash needs for items such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Eli can now store her maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. When asked, Eli spoke of her ambition to use the additional income to educate her children, eventually hoping to ensure her children are educated and have professional jobs.

loans.use: To pay for her children's school fees and uniforms to eliminate pressure to sell corn at low prices during harvest.

loans.name: Mai-Unguwa

texts.en: Mai-Unguwa is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Mai-Unguwa joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for his children, Haladu, Sagiru and Awalu. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Mai-Unguwa would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater to his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Mai-Unguwa can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40 percent higher than the market price at harvest. When asked, Mai-Unguwa spoke of his ambition to use the additional income to educate his children, eventually hoping to make more money for himself and his family.

loans.use: to pay for child school fees and uniforms, eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Lawan

texts.en: Lawan is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Lawan joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for his children, Sale, Kabiru, and Basi. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Lawan would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Lawan can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40 percent higher than the market price at harvest. When asked, Lawan spoke of his ambition to use the additional income to educate his children, eventually hoping to make more money for himself and his family.

loans.use: to pay for child school fees and uniforms, eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Ozoda

texts.ru: Озода молодая замужняя женщина в возрасте 27 лет. У нее уже есть дочь, которой 4 годика. В настоящий момент муж Озоды находится в России на заработках и Озода одна с дочерью живет в районе Рудаки. Озода энергичная способная женщина, она умеет шить и кроить. Вот уже пять лет как она предоставляет услуги швеи и принимает заказы на пошив женских платьев. В Таджикистане женщины предпочитают шить себе национальные платья только по заказу, поэтому услуга швеи здесь очень популярная. Почти каждая треть женщины занимается данной услугой и Озода не исключение. Сейчас Озода хотела бы расширить свою швейную деятельность. Она просит кредит, чтобы купить вышивальную машинку и надеется на вашу отзывчивость. Благодаря новой машинке процесс ее работы улучшится и количество клиентов тоже увеличится.
texts.en: Ozoda is a young, married 27-year-old woman. She already has a daughter, who is 4 years old. At the present time, Ozoda's husband is in Russia for work, and Ozoda and her daughter live by themselves in the Rudaki district. Ozoda is an energetic and capable woman; she knows how to cut and sew. She has been providing seamstress services and accepting orders for sewing women's dresses for five years already. In Tajikistan women prefer to sew their national dresses to-order, and this is why seamstress services here are very popular. Almost a third of women are involved in this type of service, and Ozoda is no exception. Now Ozoda wants to expand her sewing business. She is requesting this loan to purchase an embroidery machine and relies on your responsiveness. Thanks to a new machine, her work process will improve and the number of customers will increase as well.

loans.use: to purchase a new embroidery machine in order to expand her sewing business

loans.name: Jehova Es Mi Roca Group

texts.es: Al grupo solidario Jehová es mi roca, lo integra cuatro socias exitosas en su vida laboral, quien lo coordina es la señora Charlotte que tiene la edad de 37 años, acompañada y madre de cinco hijos, por quienes se ha propuesto superarse y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, se dedica a la comercialización de cosméticos AVON además ofrece el servicio de costura en su domicilio desde hace veinte años, esto le ha permitido ser reconocida en su comunidad, es segundo ciclo que ADIM le brinda los financiamientos para su negocio, este último lo requiere para la compra de tela de cinta de mantequilla, hilos, pago de bordadora, cremas corporales, perfumes para damas y caballeros, colonias para niñas, etc., de esta manera le permitirá cubrir parte de la demanda que tiene de estos productos. Cuenta con un buen equipo de trabajo entre ellos se encuentra Yahaira una mujer de 35 años de edad quien comercializa ropa para niños y cajetas en los diversos departamentos del país, María Elena una mujer trabajadora de 58 años de edad que vende en su domicilio refresco, sopa y platanitos, desde hace dos años, y Eulalia que tiene la edad de 58 años y comercializa espumías, cajetas, churros, etc., desde hace más de treinta años en los departamentos del país.
texts.en:
The group Jehová es Mi Roca is made up of four successful business women. Charlotte, the coordinator, is 37, married and has five children for whom she has made it her goal to better herself. She wants to improve her family's quality of life. Charlotte sells Avon cosmetics and also offers seamstress services in her home, a trade she has practiced for 20 years and for which she has gained recognition in her community.

This is her second loan cycle with ADIM. She needs this loan to buy fabric, ribbon, thread and to pay an embroiderer; as well as to buy body creams, perfumes for men and women, children's colognes, etc. This will allow her to meet the demand she has for these products.

She has a good work team including Yahaira, 35, who sells children's clothing and candies around the country; Maria Elena, 58, who sells soda, soups, and plantains out of her home for the last two years; and Eulalia, 58, who has been selling merengues, candies, churros, etc for more than 30 years.

loans.use: to buy fabric so that she can increase clothing production, and to invest in cosmetics.

loans.name: Ishaku

texts.en: Ishaku is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Ishaku joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for his child: David.  Before he became a Babban Gona member, Ishaku would have to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest to cater to his immediate cash needs to purchase items such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Ishaku can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. When asked, Ishaku spoke of his ambition to use the additional income to educate his child hoping to ensure his child is educated and has access to professional jobs.

loans.use: To pay for his child's school fees and uniform eliminating pressure to sell corn at low prices during harvest.

loans.name: Rosenda

texts.en:
Rosenda, from Tudela, Misamis Occidental, is happily married with three children.

Rosenda has a business of buying and selling coconut. She has been in this business for 30 years, in which she generates income to sustain the needs of her family. To sustain the operation of her business, she requests a loan from PMPC amounting to 14,900 Philippines pesos (PHP). This will be a great help for Rosenda.

loans.use: to buy coconut to sell to sustain the operation of the business.

loans.name: Hannatu

texts.en: Hannatu is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Hannatu joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for her children: Gretful, Gretios and Godwin. Before she became a Babban Gona member, Hannatu would have to sell her maize for low prices soon after harvest to cater to her immediate cash needs to purchase items such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Hannatu can now store her maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. When asked, Hannatu spoke of her ambition to use the additional income to educate her children, eventually hoping to make more money for herself and her family.

loans.use: To pay for her children's school fees and uniforms eliminating pressure to sell corn at low prices during harvest.

loans.name: Maria Candelaria

texts.es: Maria de 69 años de edad se dedica a la elaboración de tortillas desde hace 15 años, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, Maria vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo ambos trabajan y ayuda en el hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para poder continuar con la elaboración de las tortillas y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria is 69 years old and has been producing tortillas for 15 years. Her business is located at her place of residence and she has many customers. Maria lives in her own home along with her husband and son. Both of them work and help at home.

Maria is requesting a loan in order to buy corn by the quintal (1 quintal = 1 kg) and lime powder so that she can continue producing tortillas. As a result, she can earn a better income so that she can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn by the quintal and lime powder for making tortillas.

loans.name: Nidian Del Socorro

texts.es:
Gracias a la perseverancia y coraje de Nidian es que su hogar puede tener unos ingresos extra.

Ella prepara y vende alimentos de repostería en el municipio de Medellín, actividad que aprendió sola y que emprendió con el afán de buscar nuevos ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia además de ser una actividad que siempre le había gustado.

Su esposo e hijos son la mayor motivación que tiene para trabajar diariamente y esforzarse para ser cada día mejor.

Ella espera poder impulsar su negocio con la compra de insumos y materia prima para la preparación de sus recetas.

Con estos elementos ella podrá tener sus productos siempre disponibles para sus clientes.

Su mayor sueño es poder comprar su propia vivienda a través de su negocio.

Si prestas a este préstamo estarás aportando al progreso y empuje Colombiano!
texts.en: Thanks to Nidian's perseverance and courage she has been able to have some extra income in her home. She prepares and sells baked confections in the town of Medellin. She taught herself the trade and started her business because she was eager to find a way to take care of her family by doing an activity she had always liked. Her husband and children are her biggest motivation to go to work every day and try to improve. She hopes to push her business forward with the purchase of ingredients for her recipes. With those elements she will be able to always have products available for her customers. Her greatest dream is to buy her own home with her profits. If you lend to this woman you will be supporting the progress and drive of Colombia!

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making her recipes.

loans.name: Ben Glen

texts.en:
Ben Glen is 34 years old and single. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

Ben Glen has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a loan of 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy additional groceries to sell in her store.

Ben Glen has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell in her store.

loans.name: Shitu

texts.en:
Shitu is a Babban Gona maize farmer.  Before he became a Babban Gona member, Shitu would have to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest to cater for his immediate cash needs.  

With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Shitu can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest.  When asked about his goals, Shitu expressed a desire to use the extra income to build a better home, and in the long run, make more money  for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing to eliminate pressure to sell corn at low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Felix

texts.en:
Felix is a maize farmer.  Before he became a Babban Gona member, Felix would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest to cater for his immediate cash needs. 

With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Felix can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest.  Like other Babban Gona members, Felix is looking to earn a better income to provide more food and clothing for his family, and hopes to make more money for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing to eliminate pressure to sell corn at low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Dinamicas Group

texts.es: Dinámicas está integrado por tres mujeres luchadoras, quien lo coordina es Eveling una mujer de 26 años de edad, casada y madre de dos hijos, quienes la han motivado para superarse, se dedica a la comercialización de cosméticos AVON y ropa nueva, este negocio lo impulso hace seis años de la liquidación que obtuvo de la empresa que laboraba anteriormente, solicita el financiamiento de la institución para la compra de cremas corporales, tratamiento para el cabello, body, perfumes para damas y caballeros, camisetas, shorts, pantalones, etc., de esta manera podrá cubrir la demanda que tiene de estos productos. El resto de los integrantes son las señoras, Ruth de 30 años de edad y quien se dedica a destace de cerdo en su domicilio desde hace más de seis meses, y Francis una mujer de 31 años de edad comerciante de ropa en su comunidad desde hace más de seis meses.
texts.en:
“Dinámicas” is a group that consists of three determined women. Eveling, the group coordinator, is a 26-year-old woman who is married and the mother of two children. For this reason, she is motivated to succeed. Eveling sells Avon cosmetics and new clothing. She started this business six years ago with the severance pay she received from the company where she previously worked. Eveling is requesting a loan from ADIM in order to buy body crèmes, hair and body treatments, perfumes for men and women, T-shirts, shorts, trousers, and other items so that she can meet the demand for these products.

The other members are as follows:
• Ruth is 30 years old and has been butchering pigs at her home for more than six months.
• Francis is a 31-year-old woman who has been selling clothes in her community for more than six months.

loans.use: to buy body crèmes, hair and body treatments, perfumes, and other items so that she can meet the demand for these products.

loans.name: Alh. Umaru

texts.en:
Alh. Umaru is a maize farmer from Barau village in Kaduna, Nigeria.  Before he became a Babban Gona member, Alh. Umaru would have to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest to cater for his immediate cash needs. 

With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Alh. Umaru can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest.  Alh. Umaru, like other members of Babban Gona, intends to use the extra income to expand his farmland, and hopes to become the most profitable farmer in his community.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing to eliminate pressure to sell corn at low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is 24 years old, and married with one child.  For the past 2 years, she has operated an agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has borrowed from NWTF three times in the past to sustain her business.

Arlene requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.  In the future, Arlene would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Dauda

texts.en:
Dauda is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona.  Dauda joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for his children: Simon, Christopha and Clio.  Before he became a Babban Gona member, Dauda would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest to cater for his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. 

With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Dauda can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest.  When asked, Dauda spoke of his ambition to use the additional income to educate his children, eventually hoping to make more money for himself and his family.

loans.use: to pay for child school fees and uniforms to eliminate pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: April Lou

texts.en:
April Lou used her previous loan to pay for the first semester tuition fee. She was confident enough of continuing her studies despite financial needs. She is now taking her new loan from GDMPC micro credit to pay the school tuition fee for the second semester. She studies at the university because she has an ambition of having a better education. 

She hopes to have a better job in the future.

loans.use: to pay the school tuition fee for the second semester.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Editha works hard to support her family.  She operates a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising livestock. 

Editha is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional groceries to sell.  She has been sustaining her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva.  She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell in her store.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Helen successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is re-listing Helen's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 52 years old and is married with five adult age children. She lives in Tudela, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. 

Delia has a garden and has been in the flower business for a couple of years. She enjoys seeing the beauty of her growing flowers and then selling them to customers. 

However, she needs financial assistance to buy flower spray for her flower business. With this, she is borrowing money in the amount of 5,000 PHP. This loan will help Delia to conquer her business struggle.

loans.use: to buy flower spray to have a good flower harvest in her flower business.

loans.name: Juana

texts.en:
Juana, 54 years old, is married with three children and lives in Tudela, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She has vended in her little sari-sari (variety store) business for a couple of years; it's where she sustains the needs of her family.

However, to sustain the demand of the customers, she is borrowing money amounting to 8,000 PHP (Philippines pesos). This will help a lot for the sustainability of her sari-sari store.

loans.use: to purchase noodles, canned goods, soft drinks and milk for her sari-sari business

loans.name: Hazel

texts.en:
Hazel is studying at the university and she wants to have a better future. She used her previous loans from GDMPC to pay her school tuition fees. She is now taking a new loan to pay the  school fees for the second semester for this school year. 

She is grateful for this opportunity and the support she has received, and she plans to put her studies to good use by getting a job to support her family.

loans.use: to pay the  school fees for the second semester.

loans.name: Wendsongda Ii De Bingo Group

texts.fr:
Mme ZALISSA est responsable du groupe WENDSONGDA II. Mariée, elle est mère de 04enfants. Le plus âgé a 32ans et le moins âgé a 21ans. 02 vont à l’école.
Mme vend des céréales depuis 07ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants.
Elle veut s’acheter 05sacs d’haricot et 03sacs de mil.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle aider à la scolarisation des enfants. Elle ambitionne pouvoir stocker les céréales et devenir une grande commerçante.
texts.en: Ms. Zalissa is the lader of the Wendsongda II group. Married, she is the mother of four children. The oldest is 32 years old and the youngest is 21. Two are in school. She has sold grains for seven years. She stocks up in nearby markets. She wants to buy five bags of beans and three bags of millet. With the profits, she will help with her children's education. She strives to be able to store up on grains and become a large business owner.

loans.use: to buy herself five bags of beans and three bags of millet.

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.en: Ofelia is 46 years old and from Solano, Nueva Vizcaya. She is married and blessed with two children. Her husband is a tricycle driver, while she sells beauty products. Their income varies, which makes it difficult for them, for they have to send their daughter Fe Nina to college. Fe is taking up a B.S. in Accountancy. She wants to attain a degree to help her secure a job in the near future. She knows that they can’t do it alone; that’s why they want to avail themselves of an education loan of 150,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) from the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's tuition fee

loans.name: Marc Jayson

texts.en: Marc Jayson used his previous loans for the payment of his tuition fees and other school fees. Marc Jayson is studying for a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration with a major in Operations Management at La Salle University. He dreams of finishing his studies and being able to work for a bright future. He took a new loan recently to pay the school tuition fee for the second semester. He is hoping that in the end he will find success through better education.

loans.use: to pay the school tuition fee for the second semester.

loans.name: Felicisima

texts.en:
Felicisima has started her small-time business and became a boss with her sari-sari (variety) store. She has managed to have enough inventory and rolls up her capital to gain more profit. Every day, she makes good sales since hers is the only store in their barangay(village). 

Recently, she approached Paglaum for her much needed capital to restock her store with basic commodities. In the future, she hopes to mount a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities like canned goods, oil and soy sauce

loans.name: Shiony

texts.en:
Shiony thought she was in the right place when she joined the microfinance group of Paglaum MPC. She decided to give it a try after she learned she can avail financial assistance for her chosen business. She has maintained her membership in good standing without records of default up to this day. She has taken several loans and all were paid in a timely manner. 

Recently, Shiony availed a loan to purchase bags of feed and animal vitamins for her chosen business. Shiony wishes to continuously manage her business more effectively with the support of her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of feed and animal vitamins.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs for market gardening.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs for market gardening.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs for market gardening.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs for market gardening.

loans.name: Cerilo

texts.en:
Cerilo is a father of four who operates a transportation service and manages his own farm to earn a living. He has been in this business for many years and he earns well for his family.  

Cerilo had successfully repaid  his previous loan, which he used to buy tires and for repairs. He took a new loan recently from GDMPC micro credit to buy organic fertilizer to have a productive farm. He plans to build a farm warehouse in the future.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer to have a productive farm.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en: Lorna is from Dullan, Aloran. She is 42 years old and is married. Lorna owns and operates a sari-sari store. She has been engaged in her business for over 10 years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month. Unfortunately she almost lost her capital when her husband got ill. PMPC came to Lorna's rescue to give access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in the sari-sari store business. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to purchase store inventory like milk, canned goods, detergents and sugar. This loan will be her first loan from PMPC. She plans to use the revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase store inventory like milk, canned goods, detergents and sugar.

loans.name: Shorbat

texts.ru: Шорбат одна из жительниц района под названием Шахритус. Ей 62 года. Она вдова и мать пятерых детей. Несмотря на свой возраст, Шорбат до сих пор работает на скотном дворе. Как правильно ухаживать за скотами и вести животноводческую деятельность Шорбата научил ее покойный муж. Вот уже 10 лет она занимается скотоводством. Шорбат хочет создать устойчивый бизнес и увеличить доход. Она видит благополучия в доме с доходом, доход составляется от ее животноводческой деятельности. Шорбат просит кредит для купли пару голов крупнорогатых скотин.
texts.en: Shorbat is one of the residents of the Shahrituz district. She is 62 years old. She is a widow and mother of five children. Despite her age, Shorbat is still working at a livestock yard. Her departed husband taught Shorbat how to take care of livestock and run the animal husbandry. She has now been involved in animal husbandry for 10 years. Shorbat wants to create a stable business and increase her income. She envisions well-being in her home with the higher income, which will come from her animal husbandry business. Shorbat is requesting this loan to buy a pair of cattle.

loans.use: to buy a pair of cattle in order to expand her business and increase her income

loans.name: Tuvehasi Group

texts.fr:
Antoine fait partie du groupe  Tuvehasi et  habite à  Bujumbura. Il a 40 ans et est marié à Emelance, une coiffeuse. Ensemble ils ont 3 enfants âgés de 2 à 13 ans, dont  2 étudient.
Il a sous sa charge 2 enfants membres de sa famille élargie qui étudient. 

Il fait le commerce de  chaussures  depuis  27 ans. 

Il est son dixième  crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup de paires de chaussures  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait  acheter une parcelle, et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Antoine is part of the group Tuvehasi and lives in Bujumbura. He is 40 years old and married to Emelance, a hair dresser. Together they have three children, from 2 to 13 years old, of whom two are students. He supports two children, members of his extended family who are students.

Antoine has been doing commerce in shoes for 27 years. 

He is on his 10th Turame loan. With the KIVA loan he is obtaining, he is going to increase his capital and to purchase may pairs of shoes to resell, so as to earn more.

In the coming years, he would like to buy a parcel of land and see his children educated.

loans.use: to purchase many pairs of shoe to resell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs for market gardening.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs for market gardening.

loans.name: Lunabelle

texts.en:
Lunabelle is an ice cream vendor from Concepcion, Iloilo. She is 35 years old and has been in the business for more than six years now. Lunabelle is also engaged in a cycle rickshaw business. The cycle rickshaw is locally used to transport passengers to nearby destinations.

Lunabelle is asking for a loan to pay for the repair of the cycle rickshaw and to buy ice cream to sell. This loan will help her improve her business as well as her income.

In the future, Lunabelle hopes to make her business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to pay for the repair of the cycle rickshaw and to buy ice cream to sell

loans.name: Zarnigor

texts.ru: Зарнигор проживает в городке Вахдата. Ей 24 года. Она проживает вместе с мамой, братом и мужем. Ее муж работает таксистом. У нее двое детей. Зарнигор занимается предоставлением услуги портнихи. Она на дому получает заказы на шитье женской одежды. Она научилась шить у своей мамы. На сегодняшний день мама не шьет, но охотно помогает своей дочери в работе. Зарнигор просит кредит, чтобы приобрести машинку. Ее старая машинка совсем устарела и не принадлежит ремонту. Таким образом, Зарнигору остается только обратиться за кредитом, чтобы не потерять важный источник дохода.
texts.en: Zarnigor lives in the town of Vahdat. She is 24 years old. She lives together with her mother, brother and husband. Her husband works as a taxi driver. She has two children. Zarnigor is involved in providing seamstress services. She fulfills orders for sewing women's clothing at home. She learned how to sew from her mother. Today her mother does not sew, but willingly helps her daughter with work. Zarnigor is requesting this loan to buy a sewing machine. Her current sewing machine has gotten very old and cannot be repaired. Thus, Zarnigor's only option was to request a loan in order to sustain her crucial source of income.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine

loans.name: Musallama

texts.ru: Мусаллама живет в городе Душанбе, в столице Таджикистана. Она замужем и является матерью двоих дочерей, которым по 4 и 2 года, и 9-летнего сына. Сын учится в школе в третьем классе. Мусаллама по професси швея и занимается швейным делом у себя дома. Ее муж является трудовым мигрантом и часто ездит в Россию на заработки. Таким образом он зарабатывает на жизнь, чтобы обеспечивать свою семью. Вот и сейчас он готовится к поездке, однако деньги на билет не хватают. Жена видит трудное положение мужа и хочет помочь ему. Она обратилась за кредитом, чтобы купить мужу билет на самолет. Они надеются на этот кредит, так как без билета муж Мусалламы не сможет поехать в Россию и он останется без работы. Поддержите их.
texts.en: Musallama lives in the city of Dushanbe, the capital of Tajikistan. She is married and a mother of two daughters, who are 4 and 2 years old, and a 9-year-old son. Her son attends third grade in a school. Musallama is a seamstress by trade and is involved in the sewing business at her home. Her husband is a migrant worker and often travels to Russia for work. This is how he earns a living in order to provide for his family. And now he is getting ready for another trip, but does not have enough money for the ticket. His wife sees her husband's difficult situation and wants to help him. She requested a loan to buy her husband a plane ticket. They rely on this loan because without a ticket Musallama's husband cannot go to Russia and will be left without work. Please support them.

loans.use: to purchase a ticket for her husband, so that he can travel to Russia for work

loans.name: Kiswen Sida De Koulgorin Group

texts.fr:
Mr SALAM est responsable du groupe KISWEN SIDA(signifie se confier à Dieu)  DE KOULGORIN. Marié, il est père de 07enfants. Le plus âgé a 20ans et le moins a 01an 01mois. 02 vont à l’école.
Mr mène divers activités (l’élevage, agriculture) depuis plus de 40ans. Il s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants.
Il veut s’acheter  04 moutons, 02 chèvres, 05poules.
Avec ses b bénéfices, il veut ajouter l’élevage. Mr ambitionne devenir un grand éleveur.
texts.en:
Mr. SALAM is the official of the group KISWEN SIDA (meaning to trust in God) of KOULGORIN. A married father, he has seven children. The oldest is 20 years old, and the youngest is a year and month old. Two go to school. 

Mr. SALAM has had a variety of work (livestock farming, agriculture) for over forty years. He gets his supplies from nearby markets. He wants to purchase 4 sheep, 2 goats, and 5 hens. With his profits, he wants to raise livestock. His ambition is to become a major livestock farmer.

loans.use: to purchase 4 sheep, 2 goats, and 5 hens

loans.name: Adjo Marie

texts.fr:
Agée de 43 ans, Marie est célibataire avec un enfant. Elle vit dans une chambre louée dans le quartier Dabarakondjii. Elle s’occupe seule de son enfant.
Marie vend à la devanture de la maison, des oranges et des cannes à sucre. Elle travaille tous les jours de la semaine et se consacre plus de 15h de temps par jour.
Elle sollicite un prêt pour acheter 100 paniers d'oranges et 50 unités de canne à sucre.
texts.en: Marie, aged 43, is unmarried and has one child. She lives in a rented room in the Dabarakondjii district. She is alone in caring for her child. Marie sells oranges and sugar cane in front of her house. She works every day of the week and devotes over fifteen hours per day to it. She is requesting a loan to purchase 100 baskets of oranges and 50 units of sugar cane.

loans.use: to purchase 100 baskets of oranges and 50 units of sugar cane

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for her vegetable growing business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for her vegetable farming business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for her vegetable growing business.

loans.name: Lolakhon

texts.ru: Лолахону 51 год. Она мама Зарногора и теща Нусратулло. Лолахон с семьей проживает в городке Вахдат. Она раньше занималась предоставлением шитьем национальной женской одежды. Сейчас ее ремесло и мастерство унаследовала ее дочь. Ее дочь активно занимается шитьем, и он как мама обожает свою работу. Лолахон всячески ей помогает и советует. Дочка приносит в дом важный источник дохода, предоставляя услугу портнихи. Швейная машинка ее дочки устарела и ей необходимо купить новую. Лолахон не хочет, чтобы ее дочь потоеряла источник дохода и просит кредит, чтобы купить новую машинку.
texts.en: Lolakhon is 51 years old. She is Zarnogor's mother and Nusratullo's mother-in-law. Lolakhon and her family live in a town of Vahdat. She was previously involved in sewing women's national clothing. Now her daughter has inherited her trade and mastery. Her daughter is actively involved in sewing and adores her work just like her mother did. Lolakhon helps her in various ways and advises her. Her daughter brings a crucial source of income home by providing seamstress services. Her daughter's sewing machine has gotten old, and it is necessary to buy a new one. Lolakhon does not want her daughter to lose the source of income and is requesting this loan to buy a new sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine for her daughter

loans.name: Petronila

texts.en: From the Municipality of Tudela, Misamis Occidental, Philippines, a farmer who works hard on her corn site is no other than Petronila. She is 56 years old, widowed with three children. She has been in the business for many years where it supports the needs of her family. However, her corn production needs financial assistance to buy bags of fertilizers to have a good harvest. This is the reason why Petronila is borrowing money from PMPC in the amount of PHP 12,000. Petronila is very thankful for the financial help aided.

loans.use: To buy bags of fertilizers for corn production to sustain the needs to operate the business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for her vegetable growing business.

loans.name: Wend Daabo De Bingo Group

texts.fr:
Mr BARRE PROSPER est responsable du groupe WEND DAABO DE BINGO. Marié, il est père de 06enfants. Le plus âgé a 25ans et le moins âgé a 09ans. Les 06 vont à l'école.

Mr fait le maraichage depuis plus de 40ans. Il s'approvisionne dans le marché de son village.

Mr veut s'acheter 01 boite et demi de semence de tomate et 01 boite d'oignon.

Il veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour assurer l'épanouissement de sa famille. Mr ambitionne pouvoir stocker les semences et les revendre en gros.
texts.en:
Barre Prosper is the representative of the 'Wend Daabo de Bingo' Group.  He is married and has six children.  The eldest child is 25 years old and the youngest is 9 years old.  All six of his children currently attend school.

Barre Prosper has been growing vegetables for more than 40 years.  He buys his supplies at the local market in his village.  He plans to use his loan to buy one and a half boxes of tomato seeds and one box of onion seeds.

Barre Prosper will use his profits to improve the living conditions of his family.  In the future, he would like to become a seed stockist and sell seeds wholesale.

loans.use: to buy one and a half boxes of tomato seeds and one box of onion seeds.

loans.name: Saida

texts.ru:
Саида молодая бизнес-леди из города Конибодом. Ей 20 лет. Она имеет свадебный салон и занимается прокатом свадебных платьев. Этот бизнес она начала всего год назад. Саида очень целеустремленный человек и сейчас ее главная цель в жизни это добиться успеха в бизнесе. 
Саида живет в городе Конибодом с родителями и братом. Она еще не замужем. Все свое свободное время Саида посвящает своему бизнесу, потому что это ей интересно. Она сама выбирает свадебные платья для своего салона и у нее хороший вкус. Молодые девушки ее маленького городка предпочитают обращаться в ее салон. Сейчас Саида намерена привезти новый товар, чтобы привлечь больше клиентов и расширить свой бизнес. Для этой цели она запрашивает кредит.
texts.en: Saida is young business lady from the town of Konibodom. She is 20 years old. She has a wedding salon and is involved in leasing wedding dresses. She started this business just a year ago. Saida is a very goal-oriented person and now her main goal in life is to achieve success in business. Saida lives in the town of Konibodom with her parents and brother. She is not yet married. Saida devotes all of her free time to her business because it is what interests her. She chooses wedding for her salon herself and has a good taste. Young women in her small town prefer to come to her salon. Now Saida intends to bring in new merchandise in order to attract more customers and expand her business. She is requesting a loan to achieve this goal.

loans.use: to buy new merchandise in order to attract more customers and expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for her vegetable growing business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for her vegetable growing business.

loans.name: Gulukan

texts.ru: Гулукан 37 лет, замужем, мать 5 детей. Образование среднее, на протяжении 15 лет она занимается сельским хозяйством. Благодаря упорному труду Гулукан, на сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве имеется 1 корова и 20 овец. На участке мерою 1,26 ГА она выращивает пшеницу и хлопок. Прибыль от ведения бизнеса составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулукан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота, что поможет в будущем накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Gulukan is 37 years old, married and a mother of 5 children. She has a secondary education and has been involved in agriculture for 15 years. Thanks to Gulukan's hard work, today her farm has 1 cow and 20 sheep. She grows wheat and cotton on 1.26 hectares of land. The profit from running this business amounts to about 20,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Gulukan requested a loan in the amount of 150.000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy livestock, which will help her save money to repair her house in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock in order to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for her vegetable growing business.

loans.name: Songre La Panga De Koulgorin Group

texts.fr:
Mr ARBA est responsable du groupe SONGRE LA PANGA  DE KOULGORIN. Marié, il est père de 07enfants. Le plus âgé a 15ans et le moins a 04ans. 06 vont à l’école.
Mr  fait l’élevage depuis plus de 11ans. Il s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants.
Il veut s’acheter   10 chèvres, 50 poules.
Avec ses b bénéfices, il veut ajouter dans son élevageet aider sa famille. Mr ambitionne devenir un grand éleveur.
texts.en:
Arba is the representative of the 'Songre la Panga de Koulgorin' Group.  He is married and has seven children.  The eldest child is fifteen years old and the youngest is four years old.  Six of his children currently attend school.  Arba has been raising livestock for more than eleven years now.  He buys his stock at local markets.

Arba plans to use his loan to buy ten goats and fifty chickens.  He will use his profits to increase his stockholding and support his family.  In the future, Arba would like to become a large-scale raiser of livestock.

loans.use: to buy 10 goats and 50 chickens for his livestock business.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica a la crianza de ganado bovino desde hace 7 años y comercializa sus productos en los diferentes pueblos aledaños y ya tiene clientes fijos, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de ganado para continuar con la crianza y asi seguir con su trabajo.
texts.en:
Juan, 42, lives in his own home with his family.  He has been in the cattle raising business for seven years and sells his products in different neighboring villages where he has fixed customers.

The loan he is requesting is to buy cattle so he can continue with his livestock farming work.

loans.use: To buy cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for her vegetable growing business.

loans.name: Diego

texts.es:
Una oportunidad era lo que el esperaba, no sólo una puerta abierta sino lo que estaba detrás de esa puerta.  Y lo que encontró fue algo que definió lo que el quería ser. De 37 años de edad soltero originaria del departamento de Suchitepéquez que tiene cinco hijos el primero es casado y tiene familia diferente y los cuatro últimos son estudian en la comunidad donde viven. El realiza un impresionante esfuerzo a pesar de su edad, el es un hombre emprendedor y dice que nunca es demasiado tarde para empezar a desarrollar y tener una visión en el futuro.

La actividad que el dignamente a desempeñado durante 11 años es la compraventa de abarrotería en la comunidad ya que es por medio de ella puede obtener un ingreso económico para su familia y una ganancia para mejora su condición de vida.

El uso respectivo que dará al préstamo que el solicita es para la compra de mercadería de abarrotería para así tener surtida su tienda para no perder la clientela con que el cuenta para así tener mejores ingresos económicos para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.  

Los sueños de el es que las condiciones de su familia sean las adecuadas para un futuro y dar estudios a sus hijos para que lleguen a profesionales en la vida y que ellos mejoren sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
An opportunity was what Diego was waiting for; not only a door opening but what lay behind that door.  And what he found defined what he wanted to be.  He is 37 years old, single and from the department of Suchitepéquez.  He has five children, the eldest of whom is married and has his own family.  The other four attend the community school.  He makes an incredible effort, despite his age, and is an entrepreneur who says it is never too late to begin to develop and have a vision of the future.

For 11 years he has been in the grocery business in his community and this is how he earns an income for the family and a profit to improve his lifestyle.  The loan he is requesting will be used to buy merchandise for his grocery store so as to have a well-stocked store and not lose customers.  This will increase his income and improve the family's living conditions.

Diego's dream is for his family to have adequate living conditions in the future and for his children to get an education and become professionals in life so they will enjoy a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es: Ana de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella posee una pequeña tienda desde hace 1 año, y con lo que vende logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Ana esta solicitando a INTEGRAL un credito para poder comprar mas mercadería como: sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y poder surtir mas la tienda para tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Ana, 41, lives in her own house with her husband.  She has been running a small store for a year and, with the income from sales has covered some of the household expenses.

Ana is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy merchandise such as soups, eggs, basic grains, softdrinks, sweets, pastries, etc. to stock her store and earn more profit.

loans.use: To buy soups, eggs, basic grains, softdrinks, sweets, pastries, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for her vegetable growing business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for her vegetable growing business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for her vegetable growing business.

loans.name: Narzi

texts.ru: Нарзи женщина преклонного возраста, проживающая в городе Кургантюбе. Ей 65 лет. Она вместе с невесткой занимается выпечкой тортов и пирожных на заказ. Муж Нарзи пенсионер, а сын находится на заработках за границей. Нарзи недавно начала ремонт в доме, чтобы обеспечить хорошие жилищные условия для своей семьи. Однако в ходе ремонта она столкнулась с тяжелыми финансовыми трудностями. Чтобы купить недостающие стройматериалы и завершить ремонт ей не хватают собственных средств. Нарзи единственный выход из этого положения видит в получении кредита. Она надеется закончить ремонт до прихода холодной зимы и ожидает вашей финансовой поддержки.
texts.en: Narzi is an elderly woman, living in the town of Qurgan-Tube. She is 65 years old. She and her daughter-in-law are involved in baking cakes and pastries to-order. Narzi's husband is retired, and her son is working abroad. Narzi recently started repairs at home in order to provide good living conditions for her family. However, she ran into financial difficulties during the course of the repairs. She does not have enough of her own money to buy the remaining construction materials and finish the repair. Narzi's sees obtaining a loan as the only way out of this situation. She hopes to complete the repairs before the onset of cold winter and awaits your financial support.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and complete house repairs in order to improve her living conditions

loans.name: Sa'bagul

texts.ru:
Саъбагул замужняя женщина в возрасте 39 лет. У нее четверо детей. Трое сыновей и одна дочка. Муж Саъбагул работает в дорожно-строительной фирме с китайцами. Сама Саъбагул уже много лет занимается шитьем курпы и курпачи.
      "Курпа" и "курпача"- это ватные матрасы. "Курпа" шьют стандартно квадратном размере, ее используют в качестве одеяла. Курпача длинные матрасы используется как диваны. Когда Саъбагул начинает шить, она успокаивает свои нервы и от работы она получает удовольствие. Сейчас время холодов и в этом сезоне у Саъбагул боше работы и она хочет купить большое количество тканей, материалов, ваты, ниток и многое другое, чтобы шить и продать больше  курпа и курпача.
texts.en: Sa'bagul is a married 39-year-old woman. She has four children - three sons and one daughter. Sa'bagul's husband works at a road-construction firm with the Chinese. Sa'bagul has been involved in sewing kurpa and kurpachas for many years. "Kurpa" and "kurpacha" are cotton-filled mattresses. "Kurpa" is sewn in a standard square size and used as a blanket. Kurpacha is a long mattress used as a couch. When Sa'bagul starts to sew, she calms her nerves and gets fulfillment from her work. Now is the time of cold weather, and Sa'bagul has more work during this season and wants to buy a larger quantity of fabric, materials, cotton, threads and other things to sew and sell more kurpa and kurpacha.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of fabrics, cotton, threads and other materials needed for sewing

loans.name: Genaro

texts.es: Genaro, tiene 46 años de edad, es casado, tiene 6 hijos con quienes reside en una aldea de Gracias, Lempira. Tiene 15 años de dedicarse a la producción y venta de café. El café lo vende en grano en oro en la misma zona. Esta solicitando un préstamo por 15,000 Lempiras para comprar abono y fertilizantes para darle mantenimiento a la finca de café y pago de empleados para corte de la cosecha. El propósito es lograr mejor calidad y producción de café para obtener buenos ingresos para la manutención de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Genaro is 46 years old, married, and has six children. He resides in a neighborhood of Gracias, Lempira. Genaro has been producing and selling coffee for 15 years. The coffee he sells is of the golden bean variety from that area.

Genaro is requesting a loan of 15,000 HNL so that he can buy compost and fertilizers for maintaining his coffee farm. He will also pay his employees who are charged with pruning during the harvest. His goal is to achieve better production of quality coffee so that he can generate a good income for supporting his children.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizers for his coffee farm, as well as to pay his workers.

loans.name: Leidys Del Carmen

texts.es:
Leidys es madre de dos hijos de 9 y 3 años de edad; desde hace aproximadamente 5 meses se dedica a trabajar como comerciante independiente, actividad que aprendió de manera empírica y que surgió de la necesidad de generar recursos para el sustento de su familia. 
En su negocio ofrece artesanías como velas y porcelanas, cuenta con la ventaja de que diariamente conoce nuevas personas a las que les puede ofrecer su mercancía, mejorando cada día sus ventas. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar mercancía al por mayor como velas artesanales, así podrá abastecerse con más variedad para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en esta temporada de fin de año; mejorando su nivel de ingresos.

Leidys, con empeño y dedicación, desea seguir trabajando para sacar adelante su negocio, ya que para un futuro cercano, sueña con tener la posibilidad de montar un almacén en un local comercial grande donde pueda ofrecer mayor variedad de artículos y que le genere una rentabilidad y una estabilidad económica favorable para dar a sus hijos una excelente educación y una mejor calidad de vida.

Con un préstamo que hagas hoy podrás mejorar la vida y el negocio de Leidys ¡
texts.en:
Leidys is the mother of two children, ages 9 and 3.  For approximately five months she has been working as an independent merchant, an activity she learned on her own, born out of necessity to generate an income to support her family.  She sells crafts such as candles and procelain and says she has the advantage of meeting new people every day who are potential buyers, which increases her sales.

The loan she is currently requesting is to buy wholesale merchandise such as artisan candles so she can stock a wider variety to satisfy demand and increase year-end holiday sales.  This will improve her income level.

Leidys, with determination and dedication, wants to continue with her business because in the near future she hopes to have a larger shop where she can offer a wider range of products and generate more profit and a stable economy.  This will be advantageous for giving her children an excellent education and better quality of life.

By lending today you can improve Leidy's lifestyle and business.

loans.use: To buy wholesale merchandise such as artisan candles.

loans.name: Gloria Evelin

texts.es: Gloria de 37 años de edad se dedica a la crianza de ganado bovino desde hace 12 años, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde ella reside, vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijas,ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ganado bovino para poder continuar con su trabajo y si poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Gloria is 37 years old and has been raising cattle for 12 years. She sells her products in the surrounding areas that are near where she lives. Gloria resides in her own home along with her life companion and her two daughters.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy cattle. This will allow her to continue her work and earn a better income.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Hernan Anderson

texts.es:
Hernán es un joven muy emprendedor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y progresar con su negocio.

Desde hace 6 años se viene dedicando a la venta de pinturas en oleo, estos elementos los vende principalmente a amigos, vecinos y familiares que conocen a Hernán y quieren que también progrese en su actividad pero en ocasiones vende su mercancía por encargo y de manera ambulante en los sitios más transitados del municipio de Medellín.

Desde muy niño sintió gran afinidad con el comercio y las ventas, por lo que hoy en día tiene grandes habilidades en este campo gracias a su simpatía y excelente calidad de servicio, este negocio lo aprendió de su padre.

Solicita un préstamo para comprar surtido de pinturas al oleo al por mayor para aumentar su inventario y mejorar sus ventas, obteniendo así unos buenos ingresos para colaborar con los gastos de su hogar.

Tiene la esperanza de poder salir adelante gracias al apoyo de las personas de buen corazón que apoyan este tipo de proyectos.
texts.en:
Hernán is a young entrepreneur who is very determined to get ahead and prosper in his business.

For six years he has been in the oil paint business, mainly selling these products to friends, neighbors and relatives who know Hernán.  They also want him to prosper.  Sometimes he sells goods on an order basis and at other times he goes out as a street vendor in the city of Medellín.

Ever since he was a young boy he has felt a great affinity with commerce and sales; so now he has much expertise in the field, using his kind nature and excellent customer service.  He learned the trade from his father.

The loan he is requesting is to buy oil paints wholesale to increase his stock and improve sales.  This will give him more income to help cover household expenses.

He hopes he can get ahead thanks to the support of kind-hearted people who support this type of projects.

loans.use: To buy a variety of oil paints wholesale.

loans.name: Maria Emilsen

texts.es:
Maria de 54 años, es soltera y tiene 3 hijos, desde hace 4 meses comenzó a trabajar en su propia tienda de abarrotes en el municipio de Medellín.

Tiene como sueño ampliar su tienda donde distribuye artículos como leche, granos, verduras, lácteos y otros. 

En la actualidad tiene poco surtido y esto es perjudicial ya que no puede suplir con muchos productos que le pide su clientela. 

Maria, en vista de esto, optó en solicitar un préstamo con el fin de organizarse más y comprar al por mayor el surtido necesario como granos, azúcar, galletería, lácteos, entre otros, para incrementar su oferta y poder brindar mejor atención a las personas,  esto le representaría también el aumento en sus ingresos. 

Uno de sus mayores sueños es poder mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y poder tener un negocio sostenible.

Si prestas a este préstamo estarás aportando al progreso y empuje Colombiano!
texts.en:
54-year old Maria is single and has three children. Four months ago she started her own store selling groceries in the municipality of Medellin. Her dream is to grow her store and sell items such as milk, grains, vegetables, milk products etc. Currently she has very little stock which is harming her business as she cannot provide what her customers are asking for.

Because of this Maria is seeking a loan so she can get better organized and buy the necessary stock in bulk, such as grains, sugar, cookies, milk products etc. These purchases will increase her inventory and better serve her customers, in turn leading to an increase in income.

One of her greatest hopes is to be able to make improvements to her house, and another is to have a sustainable business.

If you support this loan, you will helping progress and empowering Columbia!

loans.use: Buy stock in bulk such as grains, sugar, cookies, milk priducts

loans.name: Lagem Taaba De Koulgorin Group

texts.fr:
Mr OUIGOU CLAVER est responsable du groupe LAGEM TAABA DE KOULGORIN. Marié, il est père de 06enfants. Le plus âgé a 17ans et le moins a 02ans. 04 vont à l’école. Il a 09personnes en charge.
Mr  fait l’élevage depuis plus de 20ans. Il s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants.
Il veut s’acheter   02 moutons, 05 poules.
Avec ses b bénéfices, il veut ajouter dans son élevage et aider sa famille. Mr ambitionne devenir un grand éleveur.
texts.en:
Ouigou Claver is the representative of the 'Lagem Taaba de Koulgorin' Group.  He is married and has six children.  The eldest child is 17 years old and the youngest is 2 years old.  Four of his children currently attend school.  Ouigou Claver is responsible for a total of 9 people.

Ouigou Claver has been raising animals for more than 20 years.  He buys his stock from local markets.  He plans to use his loan to buy 2 sheep and 5 chickens, and will use his profits to increase his stockholding and improve the living conditions of his family.

In the future, Ouigou Claver would like to become a large-scale raiser of livestock.

loans.use: to buy 2 sheep and 5 chickens for his livestock business.

loans.name: Annapurna Shg Group

texts.en:
Sebati, age 26, resides in the Mayurbhanj district of Odisha. She is a housewife and lives with her husband in a small village in a small house. In the daytime, she supports her husband in the agricultural activities of the family. She also is the leader of the Annapurna SHG (Self Help Group) of her village. These members of the community decided to take up loans for financially supporting their families. They take up alternate income-generating activities that would help them in contributing to their household income. 

Sebati wanted to support her husband by growing additional cash crops like vegetables in addition to the paddy and other crops they rely on. These vegetables are in high demand in the market, and the area is known for its high quality of vegetables. 

She has requested a loan for her SHG, so each one of them can take up such activities to support their families. She will use her loan portion to buy seeds, fertilizers and other necessary things for her farmland.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and other necessary things for her farmland

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr:
Agée de 40 ans, Yawa est mariée et mère de 04 enfants. 
Yawa est tisserande. En plus de son activité, elle a associé à sa profession la vente des légumes et des céréales. Elle s’approvisionne auprès des agriculteurs au marché de Notsé, une ville à 100km de la capitale. Elle travaille plus de 10h par jour.Yawa souhaite augmenter son stock par l’acquisition de 6 sacs de maïs afin de répondre au besoin de ses clients. 
Les bénéfices pourront lui permettre d’acheter des cadeaux  et de nouveaux vêtements pour ses enfants aux fêtes de fin d’année.
texts.en:
Yawa is 40 years old, married and has four children.  Yawa is a weaver by profession, but also sells vegetables and cereals.  She buys her supplies from farmers at the market in Notsé, a town which is 100kms from the capital.

Yawa works ten hours a day.  She would like to increase her stock by buying seven sacks of maize.  In this way, she will be able to respond to the demands of her customers.  Her profits will enable her to buy some présents and new clothes for her children, for the end of year festivities.

loans.use: acheter 07 to buy 7 sacks of maize.
